option.helptext: Enable/disable skill training. If disabled, training points will no longer be earned and skills will not automatically unlock, but otherwise the mod will function as normal. For example, unlearning skills and manually modifying training points through the mod menu (wish for {{W|SkillTraining}}) will remain available.
If enabled, the message log window will record every time skill training happens.

If enabled, practicing skills will make them cheaper to buy normally.
This is not a feature supported by the game, as skill costs are meant to be global and static. The mod does it's best to properly reset everything on new and loaded games, but if there are issues, turn this off (and restart the game to ).
You can also modify this setting per-game, in the `SkillTraining` wish menu.
